title: 7.3.4 Implement RightsizingAnalyzer
body:
## Parent Issue
#31 - 7.3 Cost Analysis Scanner

## Objective
Recommend EC2 instance rightsizing based on utilization.

## Features
- Get CloudWatch CPU/memory metrics
- Recommend downsizing for underutilized instances
- Calculate savings amounts
- Confidence levels

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/cost/rightsizing_analyzer.py`
- `data/pricing/ec2_pricing.json`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
